BackstoryDef.title: Reformed Bandit
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] failed as a bandit and was unfortunately captured by a colonial group. While serving a labor sentence, [PAWN_nameDef] realized how much better the life of these people had and decided to stay after being released from prison.

BackstoryDef.title: Retired Medic
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] served as a medic in the Armed Forces and retired from military life prematurely after a serious injury.

BackstoryDef.title: Correctional Officer
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a security for guarding the bandits and raiders who were captured, Supervising them until they were free to go after serving their sentences.

BackstoryDef.title: Fired Bodyguard
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was once a bodyguard for military contractor groups, but was laid off because Automatroids proved to be stronger in competitive combat capability. [PAWN_nameDef] eventually had to follow a frontier project to the rimworld to seek a living.

BackstoryDef.title: Struggling Mercenary
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a mercenary in armed groups. However, Automatroids have squeezed out the mercenaries' living space with both superior combat power and cost efficiency. [PAWN_nameDef] proved that [PAWN_pronoun]'s blood and sweat could be cheaper than an Automatroid's lubricant oil.

BackstoryDef.title: Frontier Worker
BackstoryDef.description: The profits and opportunities brought by frontier projects attracted many unemployed laborers like [PAWN_nameDef]. Like many others following the frontier project, [PAWN_nameDef] signed liability waivers to come to the rimworld.

BackstoryDef.title: Megacorp Coroner
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] worked for a megacorporation as a forensic assistant accepting credit collateral. Unlike those with special interests, [PAWN_nameDef] was pushed to the brink of collapse by daily work pressure, but also honed advanced medical skills in the process.

BackstoryDef.title: Automatroid Maintenance Tech
BackstoryDef.description: As technology and Automatroids continued to iterate, [PAWN_nameDef] was eventually laid off from maintaining Automatroids. However, in an era where Automatroids run rampant, the laid-off [PAWN_nameDef] remains an important talent for mercenaries, pirates, and private armed groups.

BackstoryDef.title: Lawless Rogue
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] came to the rimworld with a frontier project, doing whatever [PAWN_pronoun] wanted. Because [PAWN_pronoun] offended many people and violated most contract terms, [PAWN_pronoun] is now being hunted. But this kind of life is exactly what [PAWN_pronoun] pursues.

BackstoryDef.title: Retired General
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was once a high-ranking officer in the military, but became a political scapegoat in the factional struggles within the military and military-industrial complex. Although [PAWN_nameDef] kept [PAWN_pronoun]'s life through military connections, [PAWN_pronoun] had to follow a frontier project to the rimworld.

BackstoryDef.title: Traumatized Veteran
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] dedicated [PAWN_pronoun]'s youth to [PAWN_pronoun]'s country. However, the brutality of the battlefield left [PAWN_nameDef] with post-traumatic stress disorder. After the war, [PAWN_pronoun] received no proper treatment, and the difficulties of daily life forced [PAWN_pronoun] to come to the rimworld to seek a living.

BackstoryDef.title: Automatroid Godfather
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] once hired and sheltered technicians to help Automatroids learn the knowledge of self-maintenance. [PAWN_pronoun] also frequently taught Automatroids life philosophy. [PAWN_pronoun]'s powerful Automatroid armed group is viewed as an eyesore by many, but none can shake [PAWN_pronoun]'s position.
